marklogic.body: what are you inept or just stupid? did I say I was supporting this piece of shit? point was you cant make out those things with footage like this.Its not close, or clear enough to make out a scratch on the back of his head, plus the news banner is in the way the majority of the time, and don't get a full shot of his face to see if its was busted up or not? They wouldn't bring him all bloody to the station like that, and most likely let him wipe Off his face (cause they don't like when you Bleed all up in the car, or around them) so closer footage would be the only way to tell since with this footage you wouldn't be able to make that shit out. Don't be a loser follower that can't see the obvious: This footage is pointless.
